job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: <p>Fremont is a startup sports wagering fund, founded by wall street analysts who built a better way to trade on sports. Through our own trading we have developed software that improves how we make wagering decisions. We have now branched off to create a second company that will commercialize this software and bring it to the public via a website and mobile app. We are looking for programmers highly proficient in Python, Django, AWS and scalability to help us build out this software.&nbsp;</p><p><br></p><p><strong><u>Your compensation will be meaningful equity ownership.</u></strong></p><p><br></p><p><strong>Responsibilities</strong></p><ul><li>Develop and expand upon existing Python code</li><li>Integrate third-party APIs between our database and the front-end</li><li>Work closely with our current programming team to finish the first iteration of the product</li></ul><p><br></p><p><strong>Qualifications</strong></p><ul><li>Ability to dedicate 40+ hours per week (we are flexible for when you are available)</li><li>In-depth knowledge of Python and Django</li></ul>
